title: Western NY Book Arts Collaborative Winter 2008 Saturday Workshop Series
content:
Submitted by [Miss Tiffany](http://web.archive.org/web/20080228015704/http:/typophile.com/user/108 "View user profile.") : 27.Dec.2007 9.57am 

The Western NY Book Arts Collaborative presents its Winter 2008 book arts Saturday workshop series in the Buffalo NY area.

January 12  
Intro to hand set type & letterpress printing — Instructor: Hal Leader - Paradise Press

January 19  
Intro to Fontlab - Making digital fonts — Instructor: Richard Kegler - P22 type foundry

January 26  
Gocco Printing & Japanese binding — Instructors: Diane Bond & Linda Meyer

February 2  
Budgeting for Independent publishing — Instructor: David McNamara - Sunnyoutside press

February 23  
Foil Embossing workshop — Instructor: Don Dehoff - Keepsake Bindery

March 1  
Zine Publishing & Distribution — Instructors: Amy Greenan & Joel Brenden

March 8  
Silk Screening Printing on Wood — Instructor: Jeff Sherven - UB Print dept.

For more details, registration information & additional events:  
 [http://www.wnybookarts.org/events.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20080228015704/http:/www.wnybookarts.org/events.php "http://www.wnybookarts.org/events.php")

Additional workshops in Rochester NY presented by The Printing & Book Arts Center at the Genesee Center for the Arts and Education  
 [http://www.geneseearts.org/classes.phtml](http://web.archive.org/web/20080228015704/http:/www.geneseearts.org/classes.phtml "http://www.geneseearts.org/classes.phtml")
